Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.

{W}{W}{W}: Purpose
Create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
{W}{W}{W}: Justice
Exile target nonland permanent you don't control until Order Module leaves the battlefield.
{W}{W}{W}: Unity
